thread.title: Ground News - NBA betting: Atlanta Hawks have been historically bad against the spread
thread.title_full: Ground News - NBA betting: Atlanta Hawks have been historically bad against the spread

author: New York Post
title: Ground News - NBA betting: Atlanta Hawks have been historically bad against the spread
text:
Summary by New York Post The Hawks may not be the worst team in the NBA , but they have been the worst to bet on. Atlanta is 7-23 against the spread this season, the worst mark in the league and the worst 30-game ATS start over the last three decades, according to ESPN Stats and Info, via David Payne Purdum.
